name: M HOTEL DANANG
detail: Everything is perfect, nice location, amazing infinity pool.
area: Ph∆∞·ªõc M·ªπ,Da Nang - View on map

name: HAIAN Beach Hotel & Spa
detail: We generally liked the rooms and the breakfast had a big spread. But some of us require Halal meals/ or at least no pork which was a bit of challenge. Maybe the hotel could have separate no meat egg station as well as have signs to indicate if there is pork (for instance the sushi was unmarked and it wasn't obvious that there was meat in it on the second day we stayed). The afternoon tea spread was quickly depleted and was not replenished in time even though the complimentary afternoon tea hour had not ended. But good hotel for cleanliness, location and general attentiveness of staff. Nice lounge on 22nd floor and nice infinity pool and terrace area. May consider coming back again if we are in Da Nang in the future, for these reasons.
area: Ph∆∞·ªõc M·ªπ,Da Nang - View on map

name: Melia Vinpearl Danang Riverfront
detail: Smack in the middle of the city, it is a delightful place to stay like all Vinpearl hotels. The staff really work tirelessly to take good care of the guests. Ms Cam Nhung in particular, stood out. My phone ran out of credit. With a blink she uses her phone to recharge my phone balance. I When I wanted a nice seafood restaurant that is good yet inexpensive, again another staff recommended a nice place. The pools and sauna is really good. I cannot say anything about breakfast because I didn't book that option but I am sure it is just as fantastic like Hue and Can Tho VinPearl. The room size is huge (condotel) and it is well clean. Again, a newly open hotel (last year April 2018) it is adjacent to VinCom plaza which you can really enjoy varieties of restaurants and cuisines (east/west) plus groceries shopping. 6 nights is really not enough. Can't wait to go back again. Thank you to everyone at VinPearl Danang for an enjoyable stay.
area: An Hai Bac,Da Nang - View on map

name: The Nalod Da Nang
detail: This hotel is very new. About one month. That is why they do not have as many reviews. I took a chance and booked one night to see if I would like it and ended up staying a total of 3 nights. Everything here is so new and clean. The staff is very accommodating and was able to get me an ocean view room and very early check in. The staff is very professional and they really try to make sure you have an amazing stay. The pool is great and they have towels for you. Side note, do not try to take them from the pool because they are for the pool only. You will need to bring your own towels for the beach but the beach is literally across the street. They do however, give you sandals that you can wear to the beach. The breakfast is amazing and they literally have everything you can think of and is open from 630-10. I think the staff has been so great and helpful and I never hear them say no. I would highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for a place for a few nights in Da Nang.5/5 stars

name: Awaken Danang Hotel
detail: They attended to my needs promptly and were always smiling.
area: Ph∆∞·ªõc M·ªπ,Da Nang - View on map

name: Central Hotel & Spa Danang
detail: Booked a Superior Double Room for a one night stay. Room was small but comfortable. Unlike many hotels in Da Nang at the same price level, the hotel is very quiet and you can hardly hear noise from the street. Staff was friendly and helpful, spa was good for the price. However, water pressure was quite low during my stay. Everything else was good. Would recommend!
area: H·∫£i Ch√¢u,Da Nang - View on map

name: DLG Hotel Danang
detail: A lot of positives with this hotel: 1. Location is right on the beach. There are a few clusters of big hotels on the beach, and this once actually sits in between the clusters, so the part of the beach is less busy than most. 2. 2 swimming pools, one on the ground floor, one on the third floor. Both are excellent. 3. Good value for money. Rooms are clean, service is good.
area: Ph∆∞·ªõc M·ªπ,Da Nang - View on map

name: Pavilion Hotel Da Nang
detail: Pavilion is a great hotel to stay in Da nang!! We had a beach facing room and the view was just breath taking. The best part for me was that it was so close to the beach üòç It is pretty well located in Da Nang ..easy access to everywhere. In total our experience was good the staff was polite and yum breakfast in the morning!
area: Ph∆∞·ªõc M·ªπ,Da Nang - View on map

name: Luxtery Hotel
detail: The Luxtery is a true gem in Da Nang! The rooms are lovely, big and comfortable, and the kids loved the movie channels. The best thing however about this hotel is the staff, they are friendly, helpful and go out of their way to make your stay a great one! The only criticism I have is of the buffet breakfast which was always cold. They really need to make sure everything remains warm. Overall an amazing hotel that I highly recommend!
area: An Hai Bac,Da Nang - View on map

name: SALA DANANG BEACH HOTEL

I definitely recommend this hotel more than the other one! The facilities are new and modern. They offer cheese and ham, freeh fruit and salad, freshly made scramble eggs and noodles for breakfast. That is quite good for a complimentary breakfast. I don‚Äôt recommend to people who have high expectation for swimming pool, the pool is quite small but it‚Äôs good for instagram photo^^. The bed is comfy with hot bath tub! That‚Äôs wonderful stay with Sala DaNang hotel!
